Today @PayPal announced that users will be able to buy BTC, ETH, BCH, & LTC via PayPal, & pay for goods & services using crypto from merchants who accept PayPal.   Fine print: it's custodial, & initially no crypto transfers outside the platform allowed.  Still super exciting 🚀
